column5: Made a couple of trips to Erie this weekend.Caught lots of bass in the 4 to 5 lb range and a few 6 lb fish.All fish caught in 7 to 20 fow on Slammers.We were the only boat out where we were fishing. The way the bass were hitting I thing its going to be a early fall,all the bass were fat and spitting out gobys.
Nice Bruisers there Steve - awesome report & thanks a lot for sharing.  I enjoyed it.  Ryan
Great report and nice pics. I gotta get out to Erie soon.  Cheers!
Very, VERY nice fish! Thanks for sharing. Congrats to both of you!
awesome report. way to make us that cant get out there very jealous
That second Pic is a PIG.  WTG  Clarence
Some nice Hawgs there Steve!
Sweet looking hogs. Slammers hmmmmm
great looking fish Steve, kinda numbs my recent thoughts of fall steelhead
Sweet looking Smallie!
Omagawd!
Awesome fish, wow!  I'm out of the loop, what's a slammer? (I'll guess a goby coloured tube)
nice fish! Hope to find the same this weekend for the OBF qualifier!
slammers are 4" soft plastic baits made by Mark Kulik from Strike Zone Tournament Baits
awesome smallies
That's awesome..about 3 weeks ago I was even getting them in skinnier water.
Cool looking bait and until now unknown to me.  Thanks.
awesome pigs
Very, very impressive smallies! Those slammers really work!
nice day!
